text: Idh Qala Allahu Ya `Isa Abna Maryama Adhkur Ni`mati `Alayka Wa `Ala Wa A-Datika 'Idh 'Ayyadttuka Biruhi Al-Qudusi Tukallimu An-Nasa Fi Al-Mahdi Wa Kahlaan Wa 'Idh `Allamtuka Al-Kitaba Wa Al-Hikmata Wa At-Tawraata Wa Al-'Injila Wa 'Idh Takhluqu Mina At-Tini Kahay'ati At-Tayri Bi'idhni Fatanfukhu Fiha Fatakunu Tayraan Bi'idhni Wa Tubri'u Al-'Akmaha Wa Al-'Abrasa Bi'idhni Wa 'Idh Tukhriju Al-Mawta Bi'idhni Wa 'Idh Kafaftu Bani 'Isra'ila `Anka 'Idh Ji'tahum Bil-Bayyinati Faqala Al-Ladhina Kafaru Minhum 'In Hadha 'Illa Sihrun Mubinun
